name: fds
description: Food Delivery Service with AWS Serverless Workshop

scripts.goarm: CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 go build -C ~/apps/fds/src/go -tags lambda.norpc -o ~/apps/fds/dist/bootstrap main.go
scripts.goauth: CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 go build -C ~/apps/fds/src/go/authorizer -tags lambda.norpc -o ~/apps/fds/dist/auth/bootstrap authorize.go
scripts.gobuild: npm run clean && npm run goarm && npm run goauth
scripts.terraform: terraform -chdir=./modules init && terraform -chdir=./modules fmt && terraform -chdir=./modules validate
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run buildgoarm && npm run terraform && terraform -chdir=./modules apply --auto-approve

author: Karega K Scott
